title: Why is the MeTV television network not available on Time Warner Cable in Wilmington?  It is in Myrtle Beach on Time Warner. (MeTV is a new network featuring old series and sitcoms from the 50\'s to the 80\'s)
text:
Apparently Me TV can be seen on Time Warner Cable channel 931 in

Wilmington, according to Wikipedia. Here's a link to more info:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WITN-DT2



The network website says it isn't available in the Wilmington ZIP

Code, though.



Thanks for using MyReporter.com
